A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Dissapointing - looks past the stunning set pieces and surface level entertainment\, we have a mess which ignore the set uo from episode 7 and spits on the character of Luke Skywalker - i suspect the director had little knowledge of the sw universe going into this and wanted his own interpretarion\, which hit wide of the mark.
